description:
Welcome to the A-Level Statistics 1 course, one of the module studied in A-Level Mathematics. This is a detailed course looking at many aspects of the Statistics 1 module. Statistics is not a subject that you can learn passively so be ready to do lots of questions. There are many videos to help guide you through each topic which are accompanied by worksheets and quizzes. So get that pen, paper and of course your calculator ready as we learn how to do the following topics

  • Populations and Samples
  • Standard Deviation
  • Measures of Average
  • Probability
  • Binomial Distribution
  • Normal Distribution

I hope you find this course useful for learning Statistics. Good luck!
title: A-Level Statistics
